remarks.format:
## Remarks In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntryCollection> class.
In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own. However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property with a type of Object and with an index type of <xref:System.String>.
